piliyandala, bokundara salon karan hi himikariya wana aya 2003 wasare sita wasara 16k pura akhandawa rupalawanya kshethraye niyalenniya.konda sakasima, hisakes pata ganwima, peshal, niyapothu alankaranaya, sari hadaganwima, wedin kek, mal boke sakasima, mehendi, niya sarasili,manamaliyan hadaganwima, wiwidha peshal warga(aayurweda rupalawanya krama) athulu wiwidha rupalawanya hada ganwim salon karan wethin laba gatha haka.

eeyi, anu perera man umbaata kiyanne, kisi awulak thiyaganna epa umbaa thawa awurudu deka thunakin supiri waddek wenawa.
